mapper.sql: dimension_id, dimension_name, scale_id, dimension_code, create_date, update_date
mapper.select: select qd.dimension_id, s.scale_name, qd.dimension_name, qd.scale_id, s.scale_type, qd.dimension_code, qd.create_date, qd.update_date from psyc_question_dimension qd left join psyc_scale s on qd.scale_id = s.scale_id where dimension_id = #{dimensionId}
mapper.insert: insert into psyc_question_dimension (dimension_name, scale_id, dimension_code, create_date, update_date) values (#{dimensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scaleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimensionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into psyc_question_dimension
dimension_name,
scale_id,
dimension_code,
create_date,
update_date,
#{dimensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scaleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dimensionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
insert into psyc_question_dimension(dimension_name, scale_id, dimension_code) value (#{dimensionName},#{scaleId},#{dimensionCode})
mapper.update:
update psyc_question_dimension
dimension_name = #{dimensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scale_id = #{scaleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dimension_code = #{dimensionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where dimension_id = #{dimensionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update psyc_question_dimension set dimension_name = #{dimensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scale_id = #{scaleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dimension_code = #{dimensionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where dimension_id = #{dimensionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
